author: @arihantraj4786
text: it's not working with the video my code is:  #14. feature Matching with videos cap=cv2.VideoCapture(0) while True:     _,frame=cap.read()     fgray=cv2.cvtColor(frame,cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)     img=cv2.imread('temp.jpg',0)     orb=cv2.ORB_create()     kp1,des1=orb.detectAndCompute(img,None)     kp2,des2=orb.detectAndCompute(frame,None)     bf=cv2.BFMatcher(cv2.NORM_HAMMING,crossCheck=True)     matches=bf.match(des1,des2)     matches=sorted(matches,key=lambda x:x.distance)     out=cv2.drawMatches(frame,kp2,img,kp1,matches[:10],None,flags=0)     plt.imshow(out)     plt.show()     k=cv2.waitKey(5) & 0xFF     if k==27:         break cv2.destroyAllWindows() cap.release()   error:  OpenCV(3.4.4) ..\modules\imgproc\src\color.cpp:181: error: (-215:Assertion failed) !_src.empty() in function 'cv::cvtColor'   Any suggestions would be very helpful, kindly help
